sentences.en: Declaim against pride is not always a sign of humility.
Did we let the system declaim the working daywhich less than 8 hours?
sentences.cn: 我们能不能电子表单系统设定工作天的工时少于八小时?

sentences.en: He raised his right fist and declaimed: "Liar and cheat!"
sentences.cn: 他举起右拳慷慨陈词:"骗子！"

sentences.en: He used to declaim French verse to us.
sentences.cn: 他过去常给我们朗诵法语诗歌。

sentences.en: It is not a sign of humility to declaim against pride.
sentences.cn: 慷慨激昂地攻击傲慢,并非谦逊的标志.

sentences.en: It is not a sign of humility to declaim first lot times t pride.
sentences.cn: 用慷慨激昂的言语攻击傲慢并并非谦逊的标志.

sentences.en: Today, I will declaim a poem about Spring for you.
sentences.cn: 今天, 我要给你们朗诵一首关于春天诗歌英文翻译一下丫!

trans.tran_cn: 巧辩, 演讲, 高声朗读
trans.tran_en: to speak loudly, sometimes with actions, so that people notice you

trans.tran_cn: 抨击，（在公共场合）大声抗议
